text: Tendai Laxton Biti (born 6 August 1966) is a Zimbabwean politician. He served as finance minister from 2009 to 2013 during a Zanu-PF and MDC-Alliance coalition government.| Tendai Biti: Zambia denies Zimbabwe politician asylum - BBC NewsSenior Zimbabwe opposition figure Tendai Biti 'released after arrest at border' The Telegraph == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean politicians
title: Tendai Biti
